Pound.description: Charges the target with a full-body tackle.

Scratch.description: The user scrtaches the foe with claws.

Round.description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

Growl.description: Growls cutely to reduce the foe's Attack.

Leer.description: The foe is given an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The target's Defense stat is reduced.

Rock Throw.description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent.

Bite.description: The foe is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may lower defense

Spark.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the foe. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

Disarming Voice.description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokemon. This may lower attack.

Draining Kiss.description: The user steals the target's energy with a kiss. The user's HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

Flamethrower.description: The foe is scorched with an intense blast of fire. The target may also be left with a burn.

Mystical Power.description: The user blasts the foe with a ray of mystical power.

Crystal Barrage.description: The foe is blasted with numerous crystal shards. This may cause confuse the target.

Air Slash.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

Water Gun.description: The foe is blasted with a forceful shot of water.
